title: Alpha client reward?
body:
Hello everyone, I'm looking for informations! 

So a bunch of us summoners got the chance to be taken into the Alpha Client, and it said "summoner icon reward" for doing so.
I'm just wondering if you get the icon if you sign in the client, send a bug report or wait the 15th november deadline..

Thanks for awsering! {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

replies.body: A warrior's greatest weapon... is patience.

Im in the Alpha Client for a while now and i thought Logging in gives the Icon?
Its 2.20 am here and i didnt go to bed like i wanted cause im trying to find out what i did wrong.
All it said was that i'd need to log into the Alpha Client before the 15th :/
Or is it like, i log in now, and by the 15th you check for who logged in and gives those people the Icon?

Welp . . . I just noticed that the Update the Alpha Client did kind of removed the icon from my screen now . . . 
And if i go into the C>Riot Games Folder i have the exe of the Alpha but when i try to open it, it says i cant run it due to BugSplat.dll missing from the Computer. Welp update #Borked it again.
Wonder where that .exe went o.o Just went poof.
